document_data.caption: A map of Huzuz showing the Agricultural Promenade lined in black.
document_data.name: Agricultural Promenade
document_data.mainbody: The '''Agricultural Promenade''', or '''Farmers' Road''', was located in [[Huzuz]], the City of Delights, in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Description: The Farmers' Road separated the [[Clothiers' District]] and [[Peasants' District]], branching off from the [[Road to Enlightenment]] near the [[Gulf Gate]] to run north roughly parallel to [[Clothiers' Way]] before terminating at the [[Grand Bazaar]] in the [[Merchants' District]].
